description:
Skyland is continually attacked by Ranborgs. Sora and the Azure Guards defeat them, but Battamonda collects their energy and puts Skyland into a crisis.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Mega Ranborg Explosion? Protect Skyland!
Chou Kyodai Ranborg Dai Bakuhatsu!? Mamore Skyland!
超巨大ランボーグ大爆発!? 守れスカイランド!
